statements: SELECT mission_id, mission_name, launch_date, destination_planet, discovery_description FROM exploratory_missions;
SELECT mission_id, mission_name, discovery_description, destination_planet, launch_date FROM exploratory_missions;
SELECT mission_name, discovery_description FROM exploratory_missions;
SELECT * FROM exploratory_missions WHERE launch_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT mission_name, destination_planet FROM exploratory_missions WHERE destination_planet = 'Mars';
SELECT * FROM exploratory_missions WHERE launch_date > '2020-01-01' AND destination_planet = 'Mars';
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM exploratory_missions WHERE mission_name LIKE '%Discovery%' ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM exploratory_missions WHERE launch_date BETWEEN '2018-01-01' AND '2019-01-01' AND discovery_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT mission_id, destination_planet FROM exploratory_missions WHERE destination_planet IN ('Mars', 'Jupiter') ORDER BY mission_id;
SELECT mission_id, mission_name, launch_date FROM exploratory_missions WHERE mission_id < 10 ORDER BY mission_name ASC, launch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM missions;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM missions;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date, mission_status FROM missions WHERE launch_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT mission_id, mission_name, launch_date, mission_status FROM missions ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT d.discovery_description, m.mission_name, d.discovery_date FROM discoveries d JOIN missions m ON d.mission_id = m.mission_id;
SELECT * FROM missions WHERE mission_status = 'Active';
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM missions ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT mission_id, mission_name, launch_date, mission_status FROM missions WHERE launch_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT missions.mission_name, discoveries.discovery_description FROM missions INNER JOIN discoveries ON missions.mission_id = discoveries.mission_id;
SELECT mission_id, COUNT(discovery_id) AS total_discoveries FROM discoveries GROUP BY mission_id HAVING COUNT(discovery_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM Mission;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date, destination_planet FROM Mission;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date, destination_planet FROM Mission WHERE destination_planet = 'Mars';
SELECT discovery_id, mission_id, discovery_date FROM Discovery ORDER BY discovery_date DESC;
SELECT astronaut_name, astronaut_age FROM Astronaut WHERE mission_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Mission WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT mission_name, destination_planet FROM Mission WHERE mission_id = 1;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date, destination_planet FROM Mission WHERE destination_planet = 'Mars';
SELECT * FROM Discovery ORDER BY discovery_date DESC;
SELECT d.discovery_id, d.discovery_date, m.mission_name FROM Discovery d JOIN Mission m ON d.mission_id = m.mission_id;
SELECT * FROM Mission;
SELECT mission_id, mission_name, launch_date, mission_status FROM Mission;
SELECT * FROM Discovery ORDER BY discovery_date DESC;
SELECT planet_name, planet_type FROM Planet WHERE discovery_id = 1;
SELECT spacecraft_name, spacecraft_type, launch_site FROM Spacecraft WHERE mission_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Mission WHERE mission_status = 'Completed';
SELECT mission_name, launch_date, landing_date FROM Mission WHERE launch_date > '2000-01-01';
SELECT discovery_name, discovery_description, discovery_date FROM Discovery ORDER BY discovery_date DESC;
SELECT spacecraft_name, spacecraft_type, launch_site FROM Spacecraft WHERE mission_id = 3;
SELECT planet_name, planet_type, planet_discovery_date FROM Planet WHERE discovery_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM missions;
SELECT craft_name, manufacturer, launch_mass FROM spacecrafts WHERE launch_mass > 1000;
SELECT explorer_name, nationality FROM explorers ORDER BY explorer_name DESC;
SELECT planet_name, distance_from_sun FROM planets WHERE distance_from_sun < 100 ORDER BY distance_from_sun ASC;
SELECT d.discovery_name, m.mission_name FROM discoveries d JOIN missions m ON d.mission_id = m.mission_id;
SELECT * FROM missions WHERE destination = 'Mars';
SELECT craft_name, manufacturer FROM spacecrafts ORDER BY launch_mass DESC;
SELECT explorer_name, nationality, birth_date FROM explorers WHERE nationality = 'USA' ORDER BY birth_date;
SELECT * FROM discoveries INNER JOIN missions ON discoveries.mission_id = missions.mission_id WHERE mission_name = 'Apollo 11';
SELECT planet_name, distance_from_sun FROM planets WHERE distance_from_sun > 100 ORDER BY distance_from_sun ASC;
